title: Mosaic GT-1 iAR Titanium All-Road Pushes 40mm Clearance with Full Integration
content:
Mosaic Cycles utilize the ENVE In-Route Cockpit for a fully integrated GT-1 iAR titanium all-road bike, with custom geometry and paintwork included in the $8,300 USD retail

Read the full article at Mosaic GT-1 iAR Titanium All-Road Pushes 40mm Clearance with Full Integration on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
